text: @SenSchumer He smirked,spit on D. Letterman's show how evil China was to everyone. tRUMP was shown his shirt,tie made in China  & his answer was they're well made.tRUMP's the Merchant of Misery, Death. The COVID19 crisis is a HOAX.HE's SOULLESS.
